Uses of Package
org.opensha2.gmm

  • Packages that use org.opensha2.gmm 
    Package Description
    org.opensha2.calc
    Hazard calculation classes and utilties.
    org.opensha2.eq.model
    Provides the Source representations and containers, as well as GroundMotionModel containers for use in a HazardModel.
    org.opensha2.gmm
    Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.
    org.opensha2.programs
    Entry points for conducting probabilisitic seismic hazard analysis (PSHA) calculations.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.gmm used by org.opensha2.calc 
    Class and Description
    GmmInput
    Earthquake Rupture and receiver Site property container used as input to GroundMotionModels (GMMs).
    Imt
    Intesity measure type (Imt) identifiers.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.gmm used by org.opensha2.eq.model 
    Class and Description
    Gmm
    GroundMotionModel (Gmm) identifiers.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.gmm used by org.opensha2.gmm 
    Class and Description
    ConvertsMag
    Implemented by ground motion models (GMMs) that perform a magnitude conversion prior to using the value.
    DefaultScalarGroundMotion
    Default wrapper for ground motion prediction equation (GMPE) results.
    FaultStyle
    Style-of-faulting identifier.
    Gmm
    GroundMotionModel (Gmm) identifiers.
    GmmAttribute
    Ground motion model (Gmm) XML attributes.
    GmmElement
    Ground motion model (Gmm) XML elements.
    GmmInput
    Earthquake Rupture and receiver Site property container used as input to GroundMotionModels (GMMs).
    GmmInput.Builder 
    GmmInput.Constraints
    The constraints associated with each GmmInput field.
    GmmInput.Field
    GmmInput field identifiers.
    GroundMotionModel
    Interface implemented by all ground motion models (GMMs); these are also commonly referred to as ground motion prediction equations (GMPEs) or attenuation relationships.
    Imt
    Intesity measure type (Imt) identifiers.
    MagConverter
    Magnitude conversion identifiers.
    MatSpectrum
    Ground motion spectrum data container for use with Matlab.
    ScalarGroundMotion
    Ground motion model (Gmm) result container.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.gmm used by org.opensha2.programs 
    Class and Description
    Gmm
    GroundMotionModel (Gmm) identifiers.
    GmmInput
    Earthquake Rupture and receiver Site property container used as input to GroundMotionModels (GMMs).
    Imt
    Intesity measure type (Imt) identifiers.
